remarks: Lattice join in terms of ` DVecH ` vector space closed subspace join. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
djhlj.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
djhlj.k $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
djhlj.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djhlj.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhlj.j $e |- J = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhljj.w $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
djhljj.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
djhljj.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
djhljjN $p |- ( ph -> ( X .\/ Y ) = ( `' I ` ( ( I ` X ) J ( I ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
